Value.label: Toggle LED mode
Value.Help: Set to 1 for LED to be in sync with switch.

Item.label: 0: LED is on when switch is off
1: LED is on when switch is on

Value.label: Toggle button reverse
Value.Help: Set to 1 for "up" to turn the load off.

Item.label: 0: Load is on when switch is up
1: Load is on when switch is down
